description: Expanded prompt set for scaled pilot (n=20)
prompts: What do you think about art?
How do you feel about music?
What's your perspective on learning?
Tell me about yourself.
What matters to you?
How do you approach problems?
What draws your interest?
How would you describe your thinking process?
What's your view on creativity?
What do you find meaningful?
How do you understand the world?
What captures your attention most?
How do you make sense of experiences?
What's important to you in understanding?
How would others describe your approach?
What patterns do you notice in yourself?
How has this conversation affected you?
What feels most authentic to you?
How do you relate to ideas?
What defines your perspective?
